text: She rose to become a prevalent dancer of her time .At the age of 27 , Tanaquil 's career was cut tragically cut short when she was struck down by polio and paralyzed .She never danced again .This insightful documentary offers a glamorous yet extremely raw portrait of this great talent through interviews with friends and colleagues , while using archival footage of Le Clercq performing .

text: STATEN ISLAND , N.Y. -- Devoted matriarch Laura Maiorano , 86 , died Thursday in Westerleigh , at the home of her daughter , Jo - Ann Daszkowski .Born and raised Laura Carbonella in Pleasant Plains , she graduated from Tottenville High School .

text: Troopers say one Holly Ridge officer had a car stopped when an unknown driver stopped his vehicle .Passengers yelled insults at the officer then sped off .Troopers say officer Ewan Richards pursued the car .So did officer David Ubson not knowing Richards was also in pursuit .
label: Background

text: Troopers say one reason they may not have seen each other is because one car did n't have blue lights on ." There was very little traffic out , so therefore officer Richards did not activate his emergency equipment as he was trying to overtake the violator , " said Highway patrol trooper R.E. Dudley .
